comments.body: follow up adding comments to this with the commands used to generate the certs is helpful so we can regen when they expire

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@// You can use cfssl tool to generate certificates, please refer
// https://github.com/coreos/etcd/tree/master/hack/tls-setup for more details.
const CAFileContent = `
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
MIIDADCCAoWgAwIBAgIUPyoDaJMWija/6scZvsZIcPjyjqswCgYIKoZIzj0EAwMw
